comment_1: I always loved the song, and especially when it was used as the ending theme for the Neon Genesis Evangelion anime series. :)
comment_2: rofl I also got onto this from Evangelion, it's a lovely song.
comment_3: I'd love this song for my first waltz on my wedding night.....
comment_4: I had to add this song.. I love it so much. Yes, the little punk that I am and i love frank s.
comment_5: this is such a sweet song. its so simple and cute, its the kind if song you play at your wedding. aww.....
comment_6: Its "let me PLAY among the stars" not "let me sing among the stars"
comment_7: i love frank. this is one of the best songs that he sings. anybody who appreciates music loves this man. he made a huge contribution to music and he will be missed.
comment_8: damn right it is play among the stars; this is the tune that i always find myself humming at work. Simply awesome.
comment_9: great love song.  as oakie2186 said, its a good wedding song.  especially for an astronomer, or something.
comment_10: He changed it anytime he sang it...listen to Sinatra at the Sands it's sing amung
comment_11: This song gets better every time I listen to it!
comment_12: Another Evangelion fan, checking in. This is a gorgeous song, too. Absolutely beautiful lyrics. "In other words, I love you!" What a great comparison of a person's feelings with flying, etc.
